message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $170 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand your position, Bob, but $90 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
